name: Treat or Treat
description:
I recommend downloading the zip bc the webGL version isn't running as intended


Objective - Stay alive as long as possible, doors give power-ups

A/D - move left/right

Space - Jump

S- Use power-up

Power ups: Skateboard allows you to move on lava, and UFO allows you to jump as much as your like. Cannot use powerups when one is already activated.
